name: Baby Cheramy Diapers Newborn
description: Baby Cheramy new born diapers are designed with an ultra-thin absorbent core to be light with extra protective leak guards. Its cotton care design gives maximum comfort for your baby while the extra soft breathable back sheet will ensure that no rashes occur on your baby’s skin. Specifically the umbilical cord cutout avoids contact with the belly button and promotes healing. Free from chlorine & any other Harsh Chemicals. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
